thread.title: Arab Memorial II

title: Arab Memorial II
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Here again de the Arab Memorial, but now showing a window detail. Tomorrow a complete view of the memorial. Arab Memorial is a tourist spot in honor of Arab culture in the center of Curitiba. Is located in Gibran Khalil Gibran Square, near the Public Garden, the State College of Parana and Shopping Mueller. It has a cube shape with an area of approximately 140 m² and created in Moorish style having a dome, columns, arches and stained glass widnows. Around it a water mirror pool with fountains. The Memorial houses a café, a library with a capacity of 10,000 volumes and an art gallery, both with works by Arab authors. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
